topic.title: MapReduce Views using the Go SDK with Couchbase Server
topic.shortdesc: You can use MapReduce views to create queryable secondary indexes in Couchbase Server.

section.title: Querying views through the Go SDK
section.p: Querying a view through the Go SDK is performed through the ViewQuery interface that is instantiated through the NewViewQuery method of the gocb library.
